resources.string: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is needed to pick image.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is needed to save cropped image.
Permission was denied. Please consider granting it in order to use all features.
Permission was denied with never ask again.

The time people spend on their mobile devices is continuing to grow every year. As our devices become more sophisticated, the number of activities we can do on mobile is always growing, meaning we’re more likely to use them with greater frequency. Time spent with mobile apps is growing too and people like to shop online. So on the basis of customer need we design an application for our customers named as “Art and shop”. This app provides the customize designing of a T shirt .User can design his shirt in Different ways like logo on his shirt write different text on shirt and put any picture on the shirt. user can design the shirt’s front and back and then order online. This application is user friendly and easy to use. Hopefully you will enjoy it.
